name: long_create_orig
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Maps, conforms and averages (motioncorrect) raw inputs from cross-sectional directory to base space in Freesurfer.

inputs.description: Base ID to be utilized in the process.
inputs.name: Base ID

inputs.description: Time point ID. If omitted, operates on all time points in base.
inputs.name: Time Point ID

output-files.description: Output directory within <SUBJECTS_DIR> for processed time point data.
output-files.name: Output Directory
